content.text: You can make a pattern that smoothly goes from light to dark across your board. You'll need to use two loops to draw each row and column of pixels, so type for x in range(WIDTH):
You're now in the first loop, which will iterate over every column (x value). Now you need to iterate over every y value, so type for y in range(HEIGHT):
Now we’ll use the x and y variables from the loops to draw each pixel light.on((x, y), x / 8.0)
Press MAKE to see your gradient! Can you get it to go from top to bottom? Hint, you’ll need to change x to y, and 9 to 14.
